alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 9:27PM EDT until July 20 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND NORTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 927 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wilmington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Wilmington, Sabina, New Vienna, Staunton, Melvin, Lees Creek, Reesville, Bloomington, New Antioch, Jasper Mills and Burtonville. This includes I-71 in Ohio near mile marker 53. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
